comments_0.comment_text:

comments_1.comment_text:
@AiRuiChen do you have any idea about the root cause here?
 
 Not from looking at the error message. Before I changed EnvSpec comparison logic, it compares the addresses of EnvSpec objects and only returns True if they matches. Could be the case here?

comments_2.comment_text: I think these EnvSpecs are from gym and not garage, but I could be wrong. Perhaps your fix needs to be backported if they are garage EnvSpec.

comments_3.comment_text:
You are correct, the EnvSpecs are from gym. This test works fine before Environment related changes. If pinning gym version is the only difference, it could be a problem with the gym environment.
 A quick fix might be , which compares the garage EnvSpec. Or simply remove the test. It is removed from master since <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rlworkgroup/garage/commit/055b455ba18abcb8b7488a0b03da1fd8b8ab0216#diff-871176f53aa3d8337333571b8e2a8af5>#1766 </denchmark-link>
